component.name: Screenshot Applet
component.summary: A screenshot applet for the Budgie desktop

description.p: Screenshot Applet is a Budgie Desktop applet for taking and uploading screenshots to Imgur and Imagebin. It lives in your panel and features a clean interface for quickly taking screenshots.
Among other things, Screenshot Applet can:

ul.li: Take a screenshot of your whole desktop, window or a selected area on the screen
Add image effects to your window screenshots
Upload your screenshots to either Imgur or Imagebin
Keep a history of your screenshots (with editable titles)
